scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-go && npm run build-cpp
scripts.build-go: GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o go/dist/main.wasm go/main.go && cp "$(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js" .
scripts.build-cpp: emcc -o c/wasm-dist/main.html c/main.cpp -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_fib", "_main", "_free", "_malloc", "_calculateDFT"]'
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
